original_text: And king Ahaz went to Damascus to meet Tiglathpileser king of Assyria, and saw an altar that was at Damascus: and king Ahaz sent to Urijah the priest the fashion of the altar, and the pattern of it, according to all the workmanship thereof.
korean_text: 아하스 왕이 앗수르의 왕 디글랏 빌레셀을 만나러 다메섹에 갔다가 거기 있는 제단을 보고 아하스 왕이 그 제단의 모든 구조와 제도의 양식을 그려 제사장 우리야에게 보냈더니

sentences.original_text: And king Ahaz went to Damascus
to meet Tiglathpileser king of Assyria
and saw an altar that was at Damascus
and king Ahaz sent to Urijah the priest
the fashion of the altar, and the pattern of it
according to all the workmanship thereof
